aathage kadeta yabadawa hadapu kamara kali deke aathage puthauna maddahetti mahaththaya hitiya.ethuma apegame widuhalpathi thumane.gamata thibuna rediyo dekathunen ekak thibune mahaththaya langa.merediyo eka wishala ekak.kosgaha mudune hayikarapu unagahakuyi rabargahak mudune hayikarapu unagahak athara adapa kambiya indan genapukambiyak eeriyel eka kiyalayi kiwwe.thawa pilikanna paththe polawayatata bassapu adihatha atak diga yakada payippe kata hayikarapu kambiyak rediyo ekata sambanda une arth eka naminuyi.thawabatariya kiyala tharamak loku pettiyakin wayar ekakuth rediyo ekata sambanda karala thibuna.merediyo eka kriyathmaka kale mahaththaya witharayi.habayi ooka ahanna wishala pirisak sambanda una.bohodawas walata oya rediyo ahillata sahena pirisak kadeta ekathu una.rediyo eke eliwenakam pirith thiyena dawaswalata kattiya ekathuwela pirith ahanawa.aniwaryenma muwanpalassa ahanna kawuruth enawa.me kale sidda una wadagathma siddiya une 1969 julimase 21wenida wage dawasaka .lokaye manussayek hahapurakiyala handata goda bahina eka me wadagath siddiya una.me siddiyata sathi gananawaka indan kade sakachchawa une minsa handata yama pilibanda mathrukawa.rediyo eke prawruthiwalata megana gaman wistharaya kiyana nisa eeka ahannath senaga piruna.anthimedi minisa handata goda basima gana guwanwiduli pracharayak amarikawe hustan abhayawakasha madhyasthanaya ekka sudanam kala.dan me welawata kade pirenna senaga enna patangaththamamath awurudu dahayak withara wayase himihita thaththage passen kade langata giya minisa handata yana hati ahanna.
